channel.description: Recent content in Further Documentation on Spine Nuances

item.title: Sales & Marketing Material
item.description: Sales and marketing material for ostaPek® cages, pedicle fixation systems and Coligne courses.

item.title: Scientific Publications
item.description: Since 1999, clinical use of Coligne products has been presented in international congresses, and was published in peer-reviewed clinical and scientific publications.

item.title: Coligne Patents
item.description: Over the years, Coligne’s innovative approach has lead to international patents for implants, instrumentation, design and technology for both ostaPek® cage and pedicle fixation systems.

item.title: Instruction for Use
item.description: Detailed information for both ostaPek® cages and pedicle fixation systems intended use, precautions to be taken, risks and reprocessing instructions.

item.title: 510(k) Clearance
item.description: List of relevant pre-market notifications according to section 510(k) of the Food, Drug and Cosmetic Act (FDA) for both ostaPek® cages and pedicle fixation systems.

item.title: Quality Management Certifications
item.description: List of relevant quality management and assurance system certifications for Coligne as the manufacturer of both ostaPek® cages and pedicle fixation systems.
